授業目的:
To enhance students' ability in critical analysis on regional approach and transnational policy framework for socio-economic and spatial development.
Students learn the concepts and skills to analyze regional development issues and policies in this course.
THE COURSE WILL BE HELD FACE-to-FACE. But it might take the ON-DEMAND Learning. Please Check with the LUNA
到達目標:
Specific case studies on Urban Infrastructure in Europe and Asia will be illustrated, discussed and analyzed by students
- that Students can make critical assessment / recommendation for development policy national, regional and international bodies (like the UN programs).  Students can analyze regional development issues and policies in this course
特記事項: 【合併】Regional Development（総合政策学部）/地域開発論（総合政策学部）
関連科目: Other Courses taught by the Teacher (O.K.LAI) Please Check with the LUNA, Teaching References Folders or E-Mail from Prof.O-K.LAI
授業の概要・背景:
The Class is for Face-to-Face Teaching / Learning and if needed: ON Learning Folder  at LUNA 
Students are expected to do additional research work beyond class-teaching - references
授業方法:
Class conducted in ENGLISH Only. THE COURSE WILL BE FACE-to-FACE. 
Please Check with the LUNA or E-Mail from Prof.O-K.LAI
Lecture, Group Discussion, Case-Comparative Studies, Home-Work & Individual + Group Projects. 
When the Course might be as E-Learning "ON DEMAND" Please check with the LUNA

トピック.授業計画1:
This Course will be taught in English ONLY

Once weekly x 10 times; plus 4 Reading-Fieldwork Weeks. Mini-Fieldwork might be conducted
トピック.授業外学習2:
Active Participation: Research and Presentation of Findings from Classes, Policy Review, Fieldwork and Others (Intensive Classes)
Active Learning and Self-Learning beyond class instruction, incluning online learning during Covid_19
English is the medium of teaching and report-writing in this class
